extraexps.name: Extra Expressions
extraexps.description: A collection of extra expressions. Release 30.10.2011

find0.description: Case sensitive alternative to System's find expression

text0.name: Text
text0.desc: Enter the text to search for.

source1.name: Source
source1.desc: Enter where to find the text in.

character0.name: Character
character0.desc: Enter the character you want to find the code for.

cosp3.description: Cosine interpolation between points a and b.

x0.name: X
x0.desc: Source X position to calculate offset from.

angle1.name: Angle
angle1.desc: Angle to calculate the offset at.

distance2.name: Distance
distance2.desc: Distance or size of the offset in pixels.

y0.name: Y
y0.desc: Source Y position to calculate offset from.

angle1.name: Angle
angle1.desc: Angle to calculate the offset at.

distance2.name: Distance
distance2.desc: Distance or size of the offset in pixels.

snap6.description: Snap the number to grid size.

gridsize1.name: gridsize
gridsize1.desc: The grid size you want to snap the number to.

findtoken9.description: Returns the index of a token within delimited string. Returns -1 if the token is not found.

string0.name: String
string0.desc: String to search the token within

delimiter2.name: Delimiter
delimiter2.desc: Split the string with this delimiter

case_sensitivity3.name: Case sensitivity
case_sensitivity3.desc: 0 - not case sensitive, 1 - case sensitive search
